trans-unit.source: Rotates a points from the array by the specified angle

seg-source.mrk: Rotates a points from the array by the specified angle

target.mrk: Rotates a points from the array by the specified angle

trans-unit.source: The 2D array ([x1, y1, ...], [x2, y2, ...], ... [xN, yN, ...]). Every first two elements from this

seg-source.mrk: Every first two elements from this

target.mrk: Every first two elements from this

trans-unit.source: array specifies a point to be rotate. Other array elements (if any) do not change.

seg-source.mrk: array specifies a point to be rotate.
Other array elements (if any) do not change.

target.mrk: array specifies a point to be rotate.
Other array elements (if any) do not change.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

seg-source.mrk: The x-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

target.mrk: The x-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

seg-source.mrk: The y-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

target.mrk: The y-coordinates of the point on which there is a rotation, in logical units.

trans-unit.source: The angle to rotate, in degree.

seg-source.mrk: The angle to rotate, in degree.

target.mrk: The angle to rotate, in degree.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to start rotating at.

seg-source.mrk: The index of array to start rotating at.

target.mrk: The index of array to start rotating at.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The index of array to stop rotating at.

seg-source.mrk: The index of array to stop rotating at.

target.mrk: The index of array to stop rotating at.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: This function does not round a coordinate values after transformation, it can be a float type.

seg-source.mrk: This function does not round a coordinate values after transformation, it can be a float type.

target.mrk: This function does not round a coordinate values after transformation, it can be a float type.

trans-unit.source: Set bitmap to control with rotate

target.mrk: Set bitmap to control with rotate

trans-unit.source: Register WM_HSCROLL message for live scrolling and show GUI
